name: Silent Hill: Complete Set
description:
Silent Hill Complete Set is a Japanese exclusive package that contains the first four games in the Silent Hill series:
  • Silent Hill (PS One Books)
  • Silent Hill 2: Saigo No Uta (Konami Palace Selection)
  • Silent Hill 3 (Konami Palace Selection)
  • Silent Hill 4: The Room (Konami The Best)
The package also includes a set of six postcards, four of which have the original cover art for the four games, and the remaining two are reproductions of the Silent Hill film posters.

People who preordered this package also received a small keychain light that projects an image of the Silent Hill movie poster, with Alessa / Sharon.

All items are enclosed in a special slipcover box. This set was only available at Konami's online store for a limited time.
